About

Will probably talk about me and what the page was built with

Hey, I'm Jeanie.

I almost always play "Rogue" class. I have a penchant for live music and gastropubs. My favorite spot in Chicago is the Shedd Aquarium where I like to compete with my girlfriend to see who knows more sea creature trivia.
